creditline: The Eloise and Elliot Kaplan Endowment for Judaica
markings: on tray, candle holder, cup and cover, and base of spice container, stamped: [SILVER 925 / (Hebrew characters) / (Hebrew characters) G Israel]; on bottom of base, on sticker: [JANGER]; on bottom of spice box base, on sticker: [18 (circled) 41- / 770]
text: This Havdalah set includes a covered wine cup, candleholder, and spice container, all items necessary for the ceremony to end Shabbat on Saturday evenings.The sleek, silver forms fit together like a puzzle when stored on the accompanying tray.
title: Havdalah set
